statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Johnson has 19 in Hampton's 110-53 victory against Mid-Atlantic Christian
article.description: — Daniel Johnson scored 19 points as Hampton beat Mid-Atlantic Christian 110-53 on Monday night in a season opener.
article.linkText: Johnson has 19 in Hampton's 110-53 victory against Mid-Atlantic Christian
article.story: HAMPTON, Va. -- — Daniel Johnson scored 19 points as Hampton beat Mid-Atlantic Christian 110-53 on Monday night in a season opener. Johnson shot 8 for 15, including 3 for 6 from beyond the arc for the Pirates. George Beale scored 15 points, going 5 of 9 from the floor, including 2 for 5 from 3-point range, and 3 for 3 from the line. Kyrese Mullen shot 5 for 11 (1 for 3 from 3-point range) and 3 of 4 from the free-throw line to finish with 14 points, while adding 10 rebounds. Tyus Williams led the way for the Mustangs with 11 points. Janus Shepherd added nine points. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
